posts.title: Being a Consumer in India Mostly Sucks

instructions.addBlogPost: 1. Create new .md file in _content/posts/ with format: {id}-{slug}.md (or directory for rich posts), 2. Add entry to manifest.json blog.posts array (at TOP), 3. Run: node _claude/sync.js
instructions.addRichPost: 1. Create directory _content/posts/{id}-{slug}/ with post.md and rich.html, 2. Add entry to manifest with type: 'rich' and files object, 3. Run: node _claude/sync.js
instructions.addWallItem: 1. Edit _content/wall/wall.json, add item at TOP of array, 2. Run: node _claude/sync.js
